name: The Adventure of Jointer
description:
Project is a Twitch Channel reward for my friend Winter!

  • Inspired by Winter's love for Zelda
  • Mixed in some goo
  • You might even see Winter don his favorite costume!

Try it out!

  • Browser version open to public
  • Zip file available to those with key
  • Full-version to be available on PC

Check out the  Devlog to see what's new!
________________________________________

CREDITS:

  • "The Adventure of Jointer" made in RPG Maker MZ by Quexp
  • A special thanks goes out to WinterBlaze777 for redeeming the short RPG game.  It took me awhile to think of what to do for it but I had a blast!

Tilesets:

  • First Seed Material (FSM)
  • Modern tiles by Cossio
  • Modern Study MV
  • CallMeKerrigan's Modern tiles
  • Candacis' Spring tiles
  • console tiles by Aniknk
  • Edits by Quexp (unless otherwise noted)

Other Artwork:

  • Amysaurus' Zelda icon resized and added to tileset to display sword in first cave
  • Zelda-inspired header in sword cave by Quexp with Amysaurus hearts edited in header
  • Player as "Link" sprite by Wayward Martian with hair color edit by Quexp
  • Player maid "frankensprite" is a mix of Wayward and Tonbi sprites with Volpi recolor, plus hair color edit by Quexp
  • Remy Sprite by Wayward Martian with Quexp edit (human ears to cat ears)
  • Eon Sprite by Tonbi with eyes/hair recolor by Quexp
  • Battlers by Tyler Warren
  • Cat enemy faceset by DSea
  • 4-way treasure chests by Avery
  • Tall doors by Indrah
  • Picture frames by slimmmeiske2 (pics in them are Quexp edits from pics in Winter's Discord)
  • Winter face as Jointer: made in MZ's character generator
  • Winter face as Winter: Quexp added edit from MV's character generator
  • Gray blob sprite by Quexp
  • Angry uwu emote enemy by Quexp
  • Rupee by Quexp

Audio:

  • "Tavern Loop", "Things", and "Dungeons and Dragons" by Alexander Nakarada
  • "SFX_Click_01" from Modern Day Music Pack bonus material
  • "Tear" SFX by Quexp

Plugins:

  • Yanfly's Region Restrictions
  • Moghunter's Event Sensor

I worked hard to make sure everyone gets proper credit but please contact me if you find any discrepancies.
